js.dom.Quirks

type
class
Common operations that need to be performed differently across browsers.

Static Methods

addClass(element : HTMLElement, value : String) : Void

Adds the specified class the element.

addCssStylesheet(doc : HTMLDocument, content : String) : CSSStyleSheet

Adds a new style sheet to the document with the specified content.

addEventListener(target : EventTarget, type : DOMString, listener : EventListener<Dynamic>, useCapture : Bool) : Void

addOverridingCssRule(el : HTMLElement, ?style : String) : CSSStyleRule

Adds an overriding style to the specified element. These styles will not override inline styles unless "!important" is specified.

createXMLHttpRequest() : XMLHttpRequest

deleteCssRule(doc : HTMLDocument, rule : CSSRule) : CSSRule

Deletes the specified css rule.

getActualCssPropertyName(name : String) : String

Retrieves the actual property name for the specified css property. Because some CSS property names are reserved JavaScript keywords, not every CSS property has an identically equal JavaScript property name.

getBodyOffset(doc : HTMLDocument) : Option<{ y : Int, x : Int}>

Retrieves the offset of the document's body, relative to the window origin.

getComputedCssProperty(elem : HTMLElement, name : String) : Option<String>

Retrieves the computed value for a particular CSS property.

getCssProperty(elem : HTMLElement, name : String) : Option<String>

Retrieves a particular CSS property.

getCssPropertyIfSet(elem : HTMLElement, name : String) : Option<String>

getCssRules(sheet : CSSStyleSheet) : DomCollection<CSSRule>

Retrieves the rules comprising the specified CSS sheet.

getHeight(elem : HTMLElement) : Option<Int>

getIframeDocument(iframe : HTMLIFrameElement) : HTMLDocument

getIframeWindow(iframe : HTMLIFrameElement) : Window

getInnerHeight(elem : HTMLElement) : Option<Int>

Get the current computed height for the element , including padding but not border.

getInnerWidth(elem : HTMLElement) : Option<Int>

Get the current computed width for the element, including padding but not border.

getOffset(elem : HTMLElement) : Option<{ y : Int, x : Int}>

Retrieves the offset of the element, relative to the window origin.

getOuterHeight(elem : HTMLElement, includeMargin : Bool) : Option<Int>

Get the current computed height for the element, including padding, border, and optionally margin.

getOuterWidth(elem : HTMLElement, includeMargin : Bool) : Option<Int>

Get the current computed width for the element, including padding and border.

getOverrideStyle(doc : HTMLDocument, el : HTMLElement, pseudo : DOMString) : CSSStyleDeclaration

getPageScroll(?win_ : Window) : { y : Int, x : Int}

Retrieves the scroll of the page, in pixels.

getPosition(elem : HTMLElement) : Option<{ y : Int, x : Int}>

getViewportSize(?win_ : Window) : { dy : Int, dx : Int}

Retrieves the dimensions of the viewport (inner window of the browser, for top-level windows).

getWidth(elem : HTMLElement) : Option<Int>

hasAttribute(e : HTMLElement, attr : String) : Bool

Determines if the specified element has the specified attribute.

hasClass(element : HTMLElement, value : String) : Bool

Determine whether the element is assigned the given class.

insertCssRule(sheet : CSSStyleSheet, rule : String, ?index_ : Int) : CSSRule

Inserts the specified rule into the specified CSS sheet.

offsetParent(elem : HTMLElement) : HTMLElement

removeClass(element : HTMLElement, value : String) : Void

Remove a single the element.

removeEventListener(target : EventTarget, type : DOMString, listener : EventListener<Dynamic>, useCapture : Bool) : Void

setCssProperty(elem : HTMLElement, name : String, value : String) : HTMLElement

Sets new value of the css property.

setHeight(elem : HTMLElement, hight : Int) : HTMLElement

setOffset(elem : HTMLElement, offset : { y : Int, x : Int}) : HTMLElement

Set the current coordinates of the element, relative to the document.

setWidth(elem : HTMLElement, width : Int) : HTMLElement
